title._content: Mme. Da Gama and Volck child  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Mme. Da Gama and Volck child [between ca. 1910 and ca. 1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from unverified data provided by the Bain News Service on the negatives or caption cards. Photograph shows Madame Domicio Da Gama (1870-1937), born Elizabeth Belle Bates in Texas, married first to Albert Volck, second to Arthur A. Hearn, and third to Brazilian ambassador Domicio Da Gama. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2012) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.18711 Call Number: LC-B2- 3423-2
